longBusinessSummary: Shree Vasu Logistics Limited engages in the logistics business in India. It provides carrying and forwarding agency, warehouse renting, packing, and transportation and distribution services, as well as value-added services and third-party logistics solutions. The company serves customers in various industries, such as agriculture, petroleum, food-industry, FMCG, medicines and cosmetics, paints and adhesives, wires and cables, kitchenware, computers peripherals, gensets, and pumps and batteries. Shree Vasu Logistics Limited was founded in 1987 and is based in Raipur, India.
